title: How to Manifest Anything You Desire: A Beginner’s Guide

steps.title: Set clear intentions.
steps.content: Set clear intentions. It’s important to have specific, concrete goals when you’re manifesting something. Write your main goals and desires in a list to set your intentions . [3] X Expert Source Jennifer McVey, Cht Spiritual Director Expert Interview. 21 December 2021. If you’re feeling stuck, ask yourself what you want most in life. Then, consider what steps you have to take to reach this goal or dream. [4] X Research source For example, perhaps you want to make more money. You might have a goal to get a promotion at work or invest in a company.

steps.title: Use positive affirmations to affirm your goals.
steps.content: Use positive affirmations to affirm your goals. Reword your desires into positive, present-tense affirmations . These affirmations can help cultivate positive energy and motivate you. [5] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source For instance, if you wish for love , your affirmation may be, “I will find a loving and supportive partner.” Instead of thinking, “I want a ton of money,” think, “I’m a confident business person who will get a promotion.”

steps.title: Start a journal or create a vision board.
steps.content: Start a journal or create a vision board. Documenting your goals and dreams can actually help you achieve them. Dedicate a journal to your self-reflections and manifestations, writing down every desire and how you’ll accomplish them. Make a vision board with pictures or words describing your goals and dreams. Then, hang it where you can see it every day or save it as your phone’s screensaver. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Take steps toward your goal each day.
steps.content: Take steps toward your goal each day. Manifestation isn’t a magic trick—it’s about working with the universe to reach greater heights. Brainstorm different tasks that’ll help you achieve and manifest your desires. [7] X Expert Source Jennifer McVey, Cht Spiritual Director Expert Interview. 21 December 2021. Work on these small goals each day to bring yourself one step closer to your overall goals. [8] X Research source For instance, if your goal is to find love , one of your daily goals might be signing up for an online dating website or downloading a dating app. If you’d like to get your dream job , a daily goal could be fine-tuning your resume and browsing different job-hunting sites. Don’t be afraid to change things up as you work toward your goal. Try taking a new route to work, or setting your alarm for earlier. Small changes may open doors to bigger opportunities.

steps.title: Practice gratitude.
steps.content: Practice gratitude. It can be easy to get caught up in the negatives or to feel ungrateful if you aren’t seeing results. Resist the urge to feel or think negatively—instead, make an effort to be thankful for the positive things in your life, which will send positive energy out into the world. [9] X Research source For instance, you might give thanks for a sunny day or a fun afternoon spent with friends. Reframe negative thoughts into positive ones to gain a positive outlook on life. [10] X Trustworthy Source National Health Service (UK) Public healthcare system of the UK Go to source Rather than thinking, “Only 6 people watched my live stream. I’ll never be a popular streamer,” think, “6 people watched my live stream—that’s more people than live in my house! Slow progress is still progress.”

steps.title: Visualize your desires with meditation.
steps.content: Visualize your desires with meditation. Meditation is a great tool that can help calm your body while opening your mind. Take a few moments each day to close your eyes, sit still, and visualize your hopes and dreams. This can help you manifest your desires while cultivating positive energy and reducing stress. [11] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source

steps.title: Surround yourself with positive people.
steps.content: Surround yourself with positive people. Who you hang out with really does matter. Find friends in those who support you no matter what and aim to lift you up rather than tear you down. Their positive energy can help fuel you to chase your dreams and manifest your desires. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Ask the universe for help.
steps.content: Ask the universe for help. There’s no hard and fast way to do this—what matters most is that your thoughts and intentions are crystal clear. You might say your desires out loud, write a letter to the universe, or create a special “future box” full of pictures and items related to your goals. Above all, focus on stating or presenting your goals in a clear, concrete way. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Let go and trust the process.
steps.content: Let go and trust the process. Manifestation doesn’t happen overnight—it’s a continuous process fueled by your belief and faith that you can and will reach your goals. So, take a deep breath and have patience . Let go of the need for things to happen right away, and trust that everything happens at the right moment. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Believe in yourself.
steps.content: Believe in yourself. Manifestation centers around your relationship with the universe, and working toward a larger goal or desire. View the entire universe as different forms of energy. When it comes to manifestation, you need to believe and acknowledge that your thoughts are a unique energy that will help bring your goals and desires to life. [15] X Expert Source Jennifer McVey, Cht Spiritual Director Expert Interview. 21 December 2021. To do this, believe you can do anything you set your mind to.

There’s no rules on what you can and can’t manifest. At the end of the day, if it’s something you deeply want, it can be manifested. If you’re not sure what you want to try and manifest, use these ideas to spark some inspiration: [16] X Research source A promotion or new job New friends A lovely relationship with a family member A good grade A new house or car Meeting your soulmate Confidence Relaxation Money Travel

Manifesting isn’t something that happens overnight with nothing but good vibes. Contrary to popular belief, it takes a lot of work to manifest your goals. Think of it this way: the universe can only put in as much effort as you do. If you want your dreams to come true , you have to put in the work and have a positive outlook. [17] X Research source Along with this, know that you don’t have to manifest something big . Your goals and dreams are valid, no matter what they are! What you manifest doesn’t matter; it’s the intention behind it that really counts.
